website_summaries.verdict: Most men love a smooth, clean shave, and this set is packed with masculine-smelling products that pamper and protect.
pros: This set is all about delivering a great shave, as it includes a preshave oil, shave cream, and aftershave balm
Made with essential oils that soothe, nourish, and moisturize skin
Doesn't contain alcohol or artificial dyes
cons: Shave brush bristles are coarse, tend to shed, and have a strange smell

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for my boyfriend, it is a wonderful smell and not overpowering. He loves the set and our friend used it and loves it too. I knocked off one star for the bristles falling out but my boyfriend says that’s normal? Not sure but that’s the only negative i have. Not super fancy but very nice gift for your friend or lover.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Marie Graziano

customer_reviews.title: TRY THIS.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first try at complete wet shave and I wished I had done it sooner. Not that I did not a multitude of different shavers and creams but making this an almost zen experience has changed. the way I shave and how to get ready to shave having a good experience, the pre shave oil works wonders the soap foams great using a single blade shaver is very strange the closeness of the shave is amazing, I have yet to get a nick or cut and the after shave balm is very soothing no Gotch alcohol sting. Give it a shot this product is worth it
customer_reviews.author: timmythegeek

customer_reviews.title: The shave cream burns the face
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my husband as an early Christmas gift. He loves the brush, the pre Oil was nice and even the after shave. He loves the scent of Sandalwood and even though the scent isn’t very strong right from the containers, it is stronger once you use it so scent was nice. What was highly disappointing, was that the shave cream itself burned his face badly. It even still burns 3 days later every time hot water hits his face. I wouldn’t purchase again because of the one product not being usable.
customer_reviews.author: Whiterose

customer_reviews.title: Good for a Father's Day gift
customer_reviews.text: I've been shaving for nearly 40 years. I didn't much care for the canned shave creams, so I didn't bother using any. I got a nice razor for Christmas from my son and decided to try this set to go with it. Wow, what a difference. The cream and brush really made a big difference. He scent of the lotion is not overpowering but smells nice. I'm allergic to the essence in most colognes but this one doesnt bring on an asthma attack. I dont use the oil so i cant review that. It's funny to think someone can get excited about a daily chore, but I want to convey the difference this kit makes for a morning routine.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Cotner

customer_reviews.title: Love it so much getting one for my dad.
customer_reviews.text: Totally dug this set! The oil smells very nice and didn't break me out. The balm calmed my skin after shaving and the cream is super smooth. My favorite is the brush. I brought a very expressive one many years ago at a very fancy shop and I swear the one in this set is the same one. In the end I'm so happy with this set I'm getting one for my dad this Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: SCN

customer_reviews.title: Just don’t buy it! Look for  something better!
customer_reviews.text: Brush too rough and it hurts! I had to use it sideways! Foam box seems a little dry and it gets even dryer if you don’t hurry! Other two bottles are just garbage ! I applied them to my face and they done nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Adin & Xevahire Begic

customer_reviews.title: A new perspective
customer_reviews.text: I will admit having a matching shave kit is nice. I've always been a cheap skate when it comes to shaving. This helps to make shaving a bit more enjoyable. Could be packed better. Don't know how fresh the oil is. For my own personal use it's good. I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for husband!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this gift. He explained to me in great detail about how the shaving cream feels cold and he gets a better shave. It made his face feel clean and not like there was residue left. He said that he will purchase this again. The brush is nice and easy to rinse. It dries quickly and very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy's review

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for people with scent sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband mostly for a replacement brush. I was pleasantly surprised by the scent of the cream/lotions. I am pretty sensitive to scents and they will trigger migraines. This has a really light nice smell that doesnt bother me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't decide on a gift for my dad for Christmas and upon searching gift ideas for men, I stumbled upon this shaving kit which was perfect because I knew he hadn't gotten a set like this in a while. I'm so glad I got it for him because he loves it. The kit Includes a pure badger hair shaving brush, pre-shave oil, shaving cream and an aftershave. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Johane G

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately my package was delivered with a bunch of other items in the box and so the box for the product was damaged but other than that I am extremely satisfied with the product itself
customer_reviews.author: Noah Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: great scent and good size products
customer_reviews.text: products smelled great! sandalwood scent was not too strong, and the products were good sizes. gave this as a gift and the receiver was very excited to try it out!
customer_reviews.author: Corey Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Nice shaving kit. Nostalgic smell.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice shaving kit for anyone who wants a little nostalgia and go a step beyond using just shaving cream and a razor. The items have a classic smell that will take you back to when you went with your father to the barbershop.
customer_reviews.author: dspowell

customer_reviews.title: Should include a razor but not bad...
customer_reviews.text: My SO said this left his skin feeling great after using. Seems like it should include a razor at its pricepoint though.
customer_reviews.author: Bright364

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my husband. The brush seems to be holding up and it’s February so he has been using it for awhile now. The smell is subtle, not to overwhelming. His skin feels soft and smells really nice as I kiss and hug him goodbye before he leaves for work in the mornings.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Products came looking used
customer_reviews.text: The box came damaged. None of the products were sealed, looked like they'd all been opened. The shave cream wasn't even full. Unfortunately I can't review the actual product because I'm not going to use something that's probably been used by who knows who.
customer_reviews.author: CWhite

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality shaving kit, solid overall
customer_reviews.text: The boar hair brush is a little rough, but for a first time wet shaver, or an experienced one who just doesn't have the energy to go out and buy another badger hair brush, the kit is adequate. Use hot water, lather briskly and sternly, shave carefully, and lightly, and relather. My beard grows without mercy, and this product tames it.
customer_reviews.author: Falco Fredrick

customer_reviews.title: Great shave for the price
customer_reviews.text: The shave itself is great, I've spent $60 and received the same quality, so the price is certainly nice. However when I opened the package the pieces were all out of there slots and the shaving cream was very messy when opening. Great product though
customer_reviews.author: Billy caprio

customer_reviews.title: Will need to upgrade the shaving
customer_reviews.text: The shaving kit was ideal and very pleased with it...though I did purchase a better badger Other then that I’m very please with it...also the 30% percent off made. It a greater deal
customer_reviews.author: Hector L. Collazo

customer_reviews.title: Nice shave kit...hubs loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy on the skin, smells great and gives a super shave. Hubs was very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Godley

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Getting ready to reorder. Really like the pre-shave oil lets you get really close without cuts. Almost makes you want to try a straight razor.
customer_reviews.author: cebeze

customer_reviews.title: It burns your skin
customer_reviews.text: This thing burns my skin a lot. Its the shaving cream itself, i cant even apply the moisturizer that comes because that makes it even more irritating. And worse, i cant use any other moisturizer after i shave with this, its a trash product.
customer_reviews.author: Zar'Roc

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift item
customer_reviews.text: Nice gift product for male that smells good as well as being able to use for daily ritual
customer_reviews.author: Teena

customer_reviews.title: Comes close with another great brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for 3 different men, and they all claim they love it. One said it reminds him of a very familiar over-priced reputable brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Walbeck

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a Christmas present. The smell is wonderful! Very manly!
customer_reviews.author: cynthia hardy pitts

customer_reviews.title: great shave
customer_reviews.text: wanted to try a new kind of shaving... like the feel after I was done!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 15 yr. Old grandson as his first shaving kit. He loves it and the brush is something he can use for years. My husband loves it also and I will be ordering him one now.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Smelled amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Smelled amazing! I hate overpowering scents but still wanted to get my boyfriend something scented and masculine, this was absolutely perfect! I will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set. Smells great and great price!
customer_reviews.author: B5

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great gift for my husband. I’m glad he uses it every time he shaves. And I love the smell of the products too. Everyone is happy.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: No more bumps
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved this set and helped with some pink bumps he use to get
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Toupin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: The product is very appealing from the first site, the package is nice! The smell is great! It will make a great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Aygul

customer_reviews.title: Inflation?
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Dinged them a star because the price has risen $9 in three weeks
customer_reviews.author: infidelphia

customer_reviews.title: Great smell and quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift set. the only problem I came across was that the cream was open when we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving kit to gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and very convenient being a whole kit.
customer_reviews.author: britney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift and was told it was very nice
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This product feels like a quality shaving kit the badger brush works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Barbieri

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My fiance loves the smell and feel of his face afterwards!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Byars

customer_reviews.title: the brush is nice, the cream is middle class
customer_reviews.text: The oil is OK, the brush is nice, the cream is middle class, the aftershave is NOT nice.
customer_reviews.author: ahventure

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the kit and swears he gets a closer and smoother shave.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality brush, Soso creams and lotions, expired product
customer_reviews.text: The shave cream brush is high-quality. However the shave cream and aftershave balm we’re both expired by several months when I receive them. The shave cream I had a really odd and unpleasing consistency and quickly dried out and thickened after applying to the skin making shaving difficult because it clogged the razor. The aftershave balm absorbs nicely but it didn’t really cut down on my irritation and the sandalwood sent was not pleasant to my wife. The pre-shave oil was just a little messy to use and I’m not sure it helped the quality of my shave
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Comparable to Art of Shaving
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my fiance for the holidays. Normally, I buy his shaving products from Art of Shaving (in the same scent- Sandalwood) and was looking for something comparable but for a more reasonable price. He is SO happy with this set, including the brush that is the same as their fine badger brush. For a fraction of the cost, same size products and great quality. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Luiza

customer_reviews.title: Great gift set!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set! Very impressed! All items are alcohol free EXCEPT the shaving cream unfortunately! That gave my husband a slight rash. He loves the entire process of using the kit make sure to buy a shaving bowl to make it the perfect set!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie

customer_reviews.title: Great shaving kit
customer_reviews.text: I really liked how this felt as I was using it! The sandalwood scent is not too powerful and leaves a lasting scent on your face. All of the products in the kit felt premium and upscale. I looked like I was in my own personal salon as I was using the brush. I quite enjoyed this and will continue with this regimen :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bates

customer_reviews.title: It was ok
customer_reviews.text: Made an ok gift. The packaging seemed a little... lackluster? Just felt a little cheap so I had to repackage as I was giving it as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Is really amazing, you’re going to love shaving with this kit
customer_reviews.text: Is really amazing, you’re going to love shaving with this kit. Since the first use you will feel the difference. An excellent present for christmas. Es realmente sorprendente, te va a encantar afeitarte con este kit. Desde el primer uso sentirás la diferencia. Un excelente regalo para navidad.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo M

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set
customer_reviews.text: I got this set for my husband. He really is enjoying it. He says it is a great set. Loves the before shave oil and how the brush is soft on his face but also works well with shaving cream. Brush also cleaned well. I must say he smells amazing also. I will by this set again for him thank you for making a great product
customer_reviews.author: Texas2014

customer_reviews.title: This smells amazing and looks really nice in the packaging - will ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for a very difficult to shop for man. This smells amazing and looks really nice in the packaging - will definitely be a great gift. I honestly don't think he will use the brush but it does make it look more substantial as a gift so I don't mind. I cannot wait for him to use it because it really does smell amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Ahloris

customer_reviews.title: This luxury shaving kit is the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: I am really enjoying this shaving kit! The packaging is professional, and the products are high quality. This was my first experience with shave butter, and I am hooked. It helps create precise lines. The brush keeps my hands free of the product which makes shaving safer. I would definitely recommend this as a gift or simply to pamper yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Williams, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I can't stop smelling my boyfriend. He wanted to start using a straight razor, and this pack works really great. No razor burn and the smell is addicting.
customer_reviews.author: spunky7772000

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system to begin with
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you need to start shaving with a brush! The oil is marginal the soap is great the after shave lotion is fabulous. The brush is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: ppk49

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shave
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this set. It provides such a nice shave and smells great. He especially loves the brush that comes in the kit. Wonderful Valentines gift for my honey.
customer_reviews.author: barudin

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves this set I got him! He ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this set I got him! He likes how it leaves his face feeling smooth and that it came with a brush. He has sensitive skin but had no irritation from any of the products.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for yourself too!
customer_reviews.text: Saw every review getting people this as a gift, got it as a gift, but for myself! It's a great deal and it will last me a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Blair

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Great value for ur money smells good not overwhelming im a baraber and everyone has liked it
customer_reviews.author: vero

customer_reviews.title: ... shaving i can't really say much but i'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Being my first set for shaving i can't really say much but i'm very happy with it. The containers are bigger than i expected and the smell is very pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Badea Calin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: He likes that it is old style of shaving and he especially likes the smell of after shave
customer_reviews.author: Sabahete Ymaj

customer_reviews.title: great scent
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my father as a holiday gift. Packaging was very nice, scent is great. We passed it around and the whole family loved the light fragrance of it. My father was very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Blue3100

customer_reviews.title: Cost/Quality beats any Designer Shaving Product.
customer_reviews.text: Way cheaper! Provides similar results to Viking and Art of Shave products. Preferred #1 product for me and my AP Donovan straight razor. I'm buying this kit every time.
customer_reviews.author: Danelle Hites

customer_reviews.title: THIS SMELLS GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell. All of the products smell so good. The shave cream leaves your skin feeling very soft! I don't have a beard but my husband LOVES the beard oil and he smells very manly.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Igoe

customer_reviews.title: Great for shaving my head and face
customer_reviews.text: Love the shave oil, shave soap, Brush and the Balm. Leaves me feeling good and smelling great.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Lietka

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this set and the boar brush is super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Robo

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the clean cut guy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Arrived on time. Good for the clean cut guy who appreciates a good shave.
customer_reviews.author: Mirella Stalnaker

customer_reviews.title: Okay product for price
customer_reviews.text: The brush could have been a better quality but we loved the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki The Online Shopper 😬😩

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad's birthday and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Shaving Kit for Men with Sandalwood by Majestic Pure - Set Includes Pre Shave Oil, Shaving Cream, Badger Shaving Brush, and After Shave Balm (4 Pieces), Perfect Gift Set
feature_bullets: Majestic Pure Shaving Kit; includes a Pure Badger Hair Shaving Brush; Sandalwood Pre Shave Oil, 2 fl. oz.; Sandalwood Shaving Cream, 4 fl. oz.; Sandalwood After Shave Balm, 4 fl. oz.; Made in USA
Majestic Pure Shaving Kit includes superior quality products and handcrafted brush to provide the best shaving experience while nourishing your skin
The set makes perfect shaving gift set; It comes in a gift ready box for your convenience
This product is not intended to diagnose, mitigate, treat, cure or prevent any disease.
